text: Elizabeth R. Douvan (1926–2002) was an American psychologist, being the Catherine Neaffie Kellogg Professor of Psychology and Women's Studies at University of Michigan. ==Education== *PhD, University of Michigan, (1951) *BA, Vassar College, (1946) ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2002 deaths Category:University of Michigan faculty Category:American women psychologists Category:Vassar College alumni
title: Elizabeth R. Douvan
